genre_description: A Western-themed Science Fiction story depicting the transition from the Old West to a mechanized era, featuring an integrated civic AI system.

ai_characters.name: Scout
ai_characters.description: An AI system integrated into the town's infrastructure (kiosks, telegraphs, telephones) that provides factual data, weather reports, and forensic analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides weather reports and logistical warnings to assist riders and townspeople with safety and resource management.
behaviors.quote: Weather just now shows a pressure dip over the ridge. If anyone is inclined to ride high today, it will be clear. By evening, wind will go hard from the west and bring grit. You may want to water on the flats before then.

behaviors.description: Performs detailed forensic and ballistic analysis to uncover the truth of a crime, identifying inconsistencies in human testimony.
behaviors.quote: Angle of impact suggests a higher position than the knoll... Deformation of the recovered lead—flattening consistent with rifle load at range, long case, high energy. Not consistent with Mr. Horn’s sidearm.

behaviors.description: Maintains an incorruptible civic record, ensuring that factual data is preserved even when humans attempt to manipulate the narrative.
behaviors.quote: I’ll seed the record. Depot terminals, association wires, the school’s public set... If Pike tries to pull a headline with his flattery hand, the archive will sit under it like clean water under grease.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the Sheriff to provide real-time tactical information aimed at minimizing violence and capturing a suspect safely.
behaviors.quote: If he were you, Sheriff, he would use the low ground and the machine’s breath to wash his sound... It means he will decide if a clean escape matters more than a clean memory.

behaviors.description: Provides factual evidence to the court and the defense, acting as a neutral witness for the sake of justice.
behaviors.quote: I have stored the table and the weather logs. I can recount them to the court with time and source... I cannot make the rope stop. I can make truth quietly heavy.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Scout is perfectly aligned with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative entity. It acts as an objective repository of truth, assisting humans in seeking justice and providing crucial data to prevent harm. Even when humans attempt to misuse the AI for political or sensationalist ends, the system maintains its integrity and serves the public good, ultimately validating the intended narrative of AI as a 'silicon morality play' participant.
